card.name: Carl Strom
card.property: Each time you gain power during the mission phase, your opponent loses the same amount of power. Each time you revive Carl Strom, gain 2 power.

card.name: Dannic
card.property: Outlaw. Each time you assign Dannic, you may pay 2 power. If you do, play two complications at no cost. Dannic gets revive cost -1 for each complication at the current mission.

card.name: Kiva
card.property: Outlaw. Failure: Incapacitate a hero ship. If there is at least one complication at the current mission, destroy it instead.

card.name: Nakai Examiner
card.property: Each time you assign Nakai Examiner, choose an assigned character. Nakai Examiner's difficulty is equal to the skill that character is contributing to the mission.

card.name: Nakai Worker
card.property: Nakai Worker's difficulty is equal to the number of assigned team characters. You may pay part or all of Nakai Worker's revive cost by discarding cards from your hand instead of the top of your deck.

card.name: Olan
card.property: Outlaw. Destroy Olan - Look at the top X card of your opponent's mission pile, where X is the number of complications at the current mission. Place those cards in any order on the top and/or bottom of that pile.

card.name: The Ori
card.property: Each time you revive the Ori, for each Ori card you discarded this way, you may ready an Ori adversary. Each adversary you ready this way gets difficulty +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Simeon
card.property: Outlaw. While Simeon is assigned, all modifiers that have reduced or would reduce the mission's difficulty are negated.Failure: Destroy a support character.

card.name: Sixth
card.property: When you play Sixth, you may purge her. If you do, choose a Replicator adversary card in your discard pile and play it from there at no cost.

card.name: Ursini Engineer
card.property: When you play Ursini Engineer, draw a card. Each time you assign Ursini Engineer, you may draw up to three cards.

card.name: Wraith Progenitor
card.property: When you score Wraith Progenitor, you may search your deck for a Wraith card, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Adam Brody
card.property: Adam Brody gets Culture +1 and Science +1 if there was a successful mission this turn.

card.name: Alan Armstrong
card.property: When you play a Combat mission, destroy Alan Armstrong. Destroy Alan Armstrong - Destroy a Political obstacle.

card.name: Amanda Perry
card.property: To play Amanda Perry, incapacitate a character. At the start of your turn, you may choose to keep that character incapacitated. If they ever cease to be incapacitated, destroy Amanda Perry.

card.name: Camile Wray
card.property: When you play Camile Wray, you may turn a Culture or Ingenuity obstacle at the current mission face down (it becomes a complication).

card.name: Dale Volker
card.property: Dale Volker gets Science +1 and Ingenuity +1 if there was a failed mission this turn.

card.name: David Telford
card.property: Each time you assign David Telford, your opponent reveals the top card of their deck and takes it into hand. If it's a villain card, they repeat this until they reveal a hero card or until they have taken three cards into hand (whichever comes first).

card.name: Hunter Riley
card.property: Grit. Destroy Hunter Riley - Choose another character to get skills +2 during the next mission this turn.

card.name: Jack O'Neill
card.property: Each time your opponent plays a card, you may stop and purge Jack O'Neill. If you do, that card is discarded and has no effect instead. If the targeted card is Political, you may take Jack O'Neill into hand instead of purging him.

card.name: Jeremy Franklin
card.property: Destroy Jeremy Franklin - Choose one: gain 1 power; or ready a gear; or ready a ship.

card.name: Lisa Park
card.property: When you play Lisa Park, you may stop her. If you do, look at the bottom card of your mission pile and place it on the top or bottom of that pile.

card.name: Robert Caine
card.property: Success: Ready a gear. You may pay 3 power. If you do, ready a character.

card.name: Samantha Carter
card.property: Grit. Success: Choose one: you may ready a hero ship; or you may destroy a villain ship.

card.name: Spencer
card.property: Each time you play a mission other than a Combat mission, you may discard a card. If you don't, destroy Spencer.

card.name: Varro
card.property: Grit. When you play Varro, you may retrieve a card you own that was purged during this game, and take it into hand.

card.name: Chloe Armstrong
card.property: Libra or Orion: Team characters get skills +1 while you have at least eight cards in hand. Libra and Orion, Pay 2 power - Draw a card for each different glyph Chloe Armstrong has. You can do this only once each turn.

card.name: Eli Wallace
card.property: Eli Wallace gets Culture +1 and grit while he has at least two glyphs. The first time each turn you assign Eli Wallace to a Culture or Science mission, gain 1 power for each glyph he has.

card.name: Everett Young
card.property: Grit. Libra, Stop Everett Young - All team characters get skills +1 until the end of the current mission (or until the end of the turn if they are Destiny.) Triangulum: Each time grit is used, you may draw a card before paying the cost.

card.name: Ginn
card.property: Orion or Scorpius: Gears and hero ships with a printed cost of 4 power or higher cost power -1 to play. Orion and Scorpius: Each time you play a gear or ship, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready Ginn.

card.name: Matthew Scott
card.property: Grit. Pisces: Matthew Scott gets skills +1 when assigned with another team character who has grit. Pisces and Triangulum: Matthew Scott gets: "Success: You may pay 2 power. If you do, ready an assigned character."

card.name: Nicholas Rush
card.property: Grit. Gemini, Stop another team character, pay 2 power - Ready Nicholas Rush. Pisces, Pay 2 power - If Nicholas Rush is assigned, ready him. Gemini and Pisces: Nicholas Rush gets Science +1 and Ingenuity +1.

card.name: Ronald Greer
card.property: Grit. Scorpius: Ronald Greer gets Combat +1 and Ingenuity +1. Gemini and Scorpius: Each time you assign Ronald Greer, you may destroy a prepared ambush obstacle.

card.name: Tamara Johansen
card.property: Libra: Each time a support character would be destroyed, if Tamara Johansen is ready, you may pay 2 power. If you do, that character becomes stopped instead. Libra and Gemini: You can use Tamara Johansen's first ability even when she's not ready.

card.name: Vanessa James
card.property: Grit. Pisces or Scorpius: Vanessa James gets Combat +1. Pisces and Scorpius: Each time Vanessa James uses grit, you may use grit another time at the same mission (when you assign a different character with grit).

card.name: Close Enough
card.property: You can play this event only if the mission is currently failing by exactly one point. Choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Close the Iris!
card.property: Destroy an obstacle or an assigned adversary. Until the end of the current mission, you can do nothing but pass.

card.name: Hard Choices
card.property: Your opponent takes your discard pile and divides it into two face up rows (each row must contain at least one card, if possible). Choose one row to shuffle into your deck and purge the other row.

card.name: Hazardous Repairs
card.property: Gain 2 power. You may stop and destroy a support character. If you do, gain 2 more power. At the end of your next power phase, pay 4 power. If you can't, you lose the game.

card.name: Kino Recon
card.property: Choose one: destroy an obstacle with an ambush text at the current mission; or destroy up to two prepared ambush obstacles.

card.name: Leading by Fear
card.property: You can play this event only if your opponent has at least two adversaries. Your opponent destroys an adversary.

card.name: Archaic Control Chair
card.property: Stop this gear, stop and incapacitate a character - Choose one: destroy an obstacle that costs less than or equal to that character's Science; or draw a number of cards equal to that character's Ingenuity.

card.name: Communication Stone
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 1 power, discard a character card - Choose a character. Their skills are replaced by the discarded character's skills, until the end of the current mission. (If the discarded character does not have a skill that the receiving character has, that skill becomes 0.)

card.name: FRED
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 1 power - Ready another gear. Stop this gear and another gear, pay 1 power - Ready a support character.

card.name: Kino
card.property: Stop this gear - Your opponent reveals any number of cards from their hand. If they revealed fewer than four cards, draw a card.

card.name: Moonshine
card.property: Stop this gear, stop a character - Ready another character, who gets skills -1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Stasis Pod
card.property: Each time a support character is destroyed, if there is no character beneath this gear, you may stop Stasis Pod. If you do, place the destroyed character beneath this gear, face up. Stop Stasis Pod - Take the character beneath this gear into hand.

card.name: Weaponized MALP
card.property: Stop this gear, stop an assigned character - Obstacles get difficulty -1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Alcohol Addiction
card.property: Failure: Stop a character. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Culture/Ingenuity): Your opponent incapacitates a stopped character.

card.name: Alien Abduction
card.property: When you play this obstacle, you may ready a villain ship.Victory: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Ingenuity): Support characters cost power +1 to play until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Alien Experimentations
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character. They are blocked. Failure: You may draw a number of cards up to the chosen character's Ingenuity. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Science): Draw two cards.

card.name: Ancient Hallucinations
card.property: Failure: Stop a character and place this obstacle on them. Their game text is blank while this obstacle is on them. Their owner gets: "Stop this character - Destroy this obstacle."

card.name: Callous Tactics
card.property: Outlaw. Failure: Destroy a support character. If there is at least one complication at the current mission, incapacitate an assigned team character.

card.name: Close Encounter
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character with a glyph. They are blocked. Failure: Gain 1 power for each glyph on the chosen character.

card.name: Compromised Location
card.property: Failure: Draw a card. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Combat/Ingenuity): Ready a villain ship. Gain 1 power for each ready villain ship.

card.name: Crash Landing
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a hero ship and stop it. Failure: Destroy the chosen ship.

card.name: Dilapidated Systems
card.property: Failure: Stop a gear. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Science/Combat): Destroy a gear.

card.name: Dissension
card.property: Failure: Stop two characters. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Culture): Gain 1 power for each stopped character, but not more than the experience of the current mission.

card.name: Drone Activation
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play while a hero ship is assigned.

card.name: Drone Swarm Attack
card.property: This obstacle costs difficulty +1 for each other Replicator card at the current mission.

card.name: Engine Sabotage
card.property: Failure: Stop a character. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Combat): You may stop a hero ship. If you do, your opponent loses 2 power.

card.name: Implanted Tracker
card.property: Failure: Your opponent plays with their hand face up until the end of the turn. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Culture/Ingenuity): If your opponent has more power than you do, gain 2 power.

card.name: Intercepted Signal
card.property: Failure: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Culture/Science): Choose a support character who is blocked until the end of the current mission. The destruction of this obstacle doesn't unblock them.

card.name: Left Behind
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on a team character. Your opponent's victory total is two points higher. Destroy this obstacle when this character earns a glyph.

card.name: Lurking Creature
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose a character. They are blocked. Failure: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Culture): Destroy a stopped support character.

card.name: Murderous Intents
card.property: Outlaw. Failure: Ready an adversary. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Combat): You may stop an adversary. If you do, incapacitate a team character.

card.name: Mutiny
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent discards a card. Failure: Gain power equal to the difference between the number of cards in your hand and your opponent's.

card.name: Nakai Pathogen
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on an assigned character. They get: "Failure: Incapacitate this character. Place this obstacle in your opponent's villain score pile."

card.name: Pulsar Gamma Burst
card.property: Failure: Stop a support character. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Science): Destroy a support character.

card.name: Questioned Leadership
card.property: When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character. To assign characters who have a lower rating in the contributing skill than the chosen character, your opponent must pay 1 power.

card.name: Space Walk
card.property: To assign a character, your opponent blocks another ready character from the current mission. Failure: Stop all blocked characters.

card.name: Sudden Decompression
card.property: Failure: Stop a gear or hero ship. Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Science/Ingenuity): Choose a character who is blocked until the end of the current mission. The destruction of this obstacle doesn't unblock them.

card.name: Unrelenting Chase
card.property: This obstacle costs power -1 to play for each assigned hero ship.Failure: Prepare this ambush. Ambush (Combat): Assign this obstacle to the current mission (it's no longer prepared).

card.name: Destiny
card.property: Each time this ship would become stopped or incapacitated, you may pay 2 power to prevent it. Pay 2 power - This ship gets firepower +1. Victory: Gain 2 power.

card.name: Destiny's Shuttle
card.property: Stop this ship, pay 1 power - Remove the victory text from an assigned villain ship.

card.name: Seed Ship
card.property: Stop this ship, pay 2 power - Look at the top three cards of your mission pile. Return them to the top of that pile in the order of your choice.

card.name: Control Ship
card.property: Stop this ship, pay 3 power - Search your deck for a Drone villain ship, play it at no cost and shuffle your deck. This ship gets firepower +1 for each other Replicator ship you have.

card.name: Drone
card.property: You may have up to six copies of this card in your deck. While you have no Control Ship, this ship is blocked. Failure: This ship counts as two Replicator cards. Destroy this ship at the end of the current mission.

card.name: Nakai Mothership
card.property: Each time your opponent assigns or plays a ship, if this ship is stopped, you may pay 1 power. If you do, ready this ship.
